issue.title: Clean up many ASF license headers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1288](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1288). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have many files where the ASL 2.0 license header has been applied, but not the proper ASF license header

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1288?focusedCommentId=16103646) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 900
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/900>
